title: S1 Ep50: Reshaping gender attitudes in India
itunes:title: Reshaping gender attitudes in India
description: Children decide what's normal for girls and boys early in their development. Seema Jayachandran tells Tim Phillips how a program of discussions about gender equality at school can successfully change damaging attitudes to women's rights.
itunes:author: VoxDev.org
